Texas Department of Banking

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column width=”1/6″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-info” color=”white” background_style=”rounded” background_color=”orange” align=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/6″][vc_column_text]

For Employers or Employees who are domiciled or employed in Texas and have questions concerning your payroll tax filing:

If you have a complaint, first contact the Client Relations HR & Payroll division of JetPay, An NCR Company at 800-366-9729. If you still have an unresolved complaint regarding the company’s payroll tax filing activity, please direct your complaint to: Texas Department of Banking, 2601 North Lamar Boulevard, Austin, Texas 78705, 1-877-276-5554 (toll free), or visit www.dob.texas.gov.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1546975534152{margin-top: -120px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-image: url(https://www.jetpay.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/05/jetpay_partners_9.jpg?id=7918) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_row][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1546982541523{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;padding-left: 100px !important;background-color: rgba(19,113,207,0.73) !important;*background-color: rgb(19,113,207) !important;}”][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1546979113290{margin-top: -16px !important;}”]

The Mobile Solution Built for Merchants On-the-Go  

Take keyed card payments securely and conveniently for all your mobile and web transaction needs

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row gap=”25″ equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1546980666593{margin-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1546980152739{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Introducing the Swift B250

A 3-in-1 bluetooth reader.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”25″ equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1546979430683{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1540328968660{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”12755″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Accept Payments On-the-Go.

With Features like:

  • Bluetooth low energy to eliminate audio jack connectivity issues.
  • EMV Quick Chip to optimize and speed up the checkout process.
  • Accept all digital wallets including NFC Contactless, Apple Pay, Andriod Pay and Samsung Pay.

 

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”25″ equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1546980152739{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Built For Mobile Transactions

Without compromising features.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1546979508431{padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1540333422806{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-database” color=”custom” size=”lg” align=”center” custom_color=”#5d5d61″][vc_column_text]

Additional Information in Each Transaction Description

You have the option to input additional details in reports for each keyed transaction including cardholder name, reference number and more!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-credit-card” color=”custom” size=”lg” align=”center” custom_color=”#5d5d61″][vc_column_text]

No Card Reader Required, Take Payments Anywhere

Merchants can accept card payments using any device, and track their keyed transactions in real-time, alongside all other transactions in their SwipeSimple reports. 

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-address-card-o” color=”custom” size=”lg” align=”center” custom_color=”#5d5d61″][vc_column_text]

Address Verification Service

AVS details can be sent to supported processors, allowing you to lower your transaction fees and reduce fraud.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”25″ equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1540328994240{padding-top: 24px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”endlist”]

SwipeSimple’s additional features allow for constant improvement and acceleration of transactions!.

  • Save Customers’ Information and Card on File.

    Store customers’ information including address, purchase history, and cards on file to better serve your customers, efficiently process repeat orders, and more.

  • Subscriptions, Installments, and Scheduled Payments.

    Charge customers at any time using their stored cards, schedule payments for a future date, split payments into installments, or start a recurring payment for repeat customers and services.

  • Access the Reports You Need to Grow Your Business

    Use data to improve your business with reports on scheduled payments and information on your top customers, in addition to all your other SwipeSimple reports.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

To learn more about using SwipeSimple in your business – contact us today!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_btn title=”Try SwipeSimple” color=”blue” size=”lg” align=”center” button_block=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.jetpay.com%2Fpayments-contact%2F|||”][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Enterprise grade hardware

No cheap tablets or consumer grade hardware here! All Mynt hardware is enterprise grade and specifically designed for the rigors of daily use in high paced, tough environments.

  • Heavy Duty Cash Drawer

Complete lineup

LEARN MORE  >>

Optimized for your business

Mynt comes complete right out of the box

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1546979653804{padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1540333422806{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-cubes” color=”custom” size=”lg” align=”center” custom_color=”#5d5d61″][vc_column_text]

Feature-rich software

Mynt software was designed with the merchant in mind. Our software is easy to use and full of features to help your business run smoothly.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-phone” color=”custom” size=”lg” align=”center” custom_color=”#5d5d61″][vc_column_text]

Award winning support

24/7/365 USA-based technical support that is always there to answer any questions you may have. 

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-shield” color=”custom” size=”lg” align=”center” custom_color=”#5d5d61″][vc_column_text]

Lifetime Warranty

Mynt believes in their hardware so strongly that they offer a lifetime warranty. If anything goes wrong, they will repair or replace your unit at no cost to you.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”25″ equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1540328994240{padding-top: 24px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Perfect for establishments large or small.

Every business is unique, which is why Mynt does not believe in the “one size fits all” approach. We offer two distinctly different solutions to fit your needs and budget.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text el_class=”jp-card”]

Pro

Mynt Pro is perfect for your single location restaurant or retail establishment with 5 or fewer registers.

Features include:

  • Table service with custom table layouts
  • Custom add-ons and modifiers
  • Highly customized tax rates
  • Remote kitchen printing
  • Gratuity and split checks
  • Easy item editing
  • Robust backend reporting
  • Scale integration
  • And more!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text el_class=”jp-card”]

Enterprise

Mynt Enterprise is the most advanced turnkey POS solution for multi-location, franchise QSRs and traditional table service restaurants.

Features include:

All from Mynt Pro plus:

  • Multi-location HQ management & reporting
  • Automated meal coursing
  • Kitchen displays and digital menu boards
  • Online ordering & reservations
  • Gift & Loyalty integration
  • Enhanced table service features
  • And more!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

To learn more about using Mynt in your business – contact us today!

Jet(K)

JetPay is proud to introduce Jet(K)

An  integrated 401(k) payroll solution.

The Benefits of an Integrated 401(k)

Simply Seamless.

JetPay and it’s expanding group of integrated partners have teamed up to allow you to easily and securely exchange 401(k) payroll data between you, your employees and your Recordkeeping Platform. Processing a 401(k) deductions has never been so easy and fluid.

 

View Our Partners >>[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”42px”][vc_empty_space height=”42px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1548890554306{padding-right: 40px !important;}” el_class=”seamless”]

[vc_row full_height=”yes” columns_placement=”top” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1531858470900{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1531856378847{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

BUSINESS LOANS

Offered By Biz2Credit

 

Fast funding to grow your business.

Building a business takes more than time and talent — it also takes capital. content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” parallax=”content-moving” parallax_image=”8697″ parallax_speed_bg=”5″ css=”.vc_custom_1529961933662{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 65px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading source=”post_title” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:46|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:2″ google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text el_id=”TLSEOLH1″ el_class=”body1″]

Why Do I Have To Update?

Starting July 1, 2018, JetPay will disable support for the outdated TLS 1.0 SSL encryption protocol. The disablement of TLS 1.0 will prevent transaction processing on systems with this older protocol.  We will support newer versions of TLS including 1.1 and 1.2.

TLS ensures that a connection to a remote endpoint is to the intended destination through encryption and endpoint identity verification. JetPay uses TLS as a key component of security.

Why is this happening?

We take the protection of our merchant data very seriously. The disablement of TLS 1.0 is required by the card brands to maintain the highest security standards and promote the safety of your data as well as align with industry-wide PCI requirements. TLS 1.1 and 1.2 have already been enabled.

When is this happening?

This will go into effect on July 1st, 2018.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column el_class=”card elevation4″][vc_column_text]

How to Switch

[/vc_column_text][vc_tta_accordion active_section=”1″ no_fill=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1530306113595{border-radius: 2px !important;}”][vc_tta_section title=”Details on Switching” tab_id=”1530021110407-d4c44a9a-7b75″][vc_column_text]

Security and Compliance

Due to several weaknesses found in TLS 1.0, many websites, software applications and Internet services are requiring the use of TLS1.2.  The latest PCI compliance standards require that any web site, web application or software application that accepts credit card payments must use TLS 1.2 after June 30th, 2018*.

SSL vs. TLS

Many merchants are under the impression that upgrading their SSL certificate is enough but it’s not. Your website SSL certificate works at the top layer of your browser by securing the browser when someone visits your site. The TLS certificate encrypts and protects data being sent from your web server to another server across the internet. Both SSL and TLS must be updated to be compliant.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Remember:
  • Your certificates must be from a Certifying Authority (CA).
  • Self-signed certificates are not acceptable and JetPay will refuse connections with self-signed certificates.
  • Certificates can not be “shared” certificates. The certificate for your site must be issued directly for your domain. 

*https://www.pcisecuritystandards.org/pdfs/15_12_18_SSL_Webinar_Press_Release_FINAL.pdf, Retrieved 2016-07-11[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”JetPay Virtual Terminal Users” tab_id=”1529961987315-a987699b-108a”][vc_column_text el_class=”body1″]If you are a JetPay Virtual Terminal merchant that has not migrated to the new online virtual terminal platform, you are encouraged to contact JetPay Customer Service to schedule your migration to the new version.

The current version of Virtual Terminal will end-of-life on June 30th, 2018. At this time you will no longer be able to process transactions with the old version. 

If you have already migrated to the online version but are continuing to use the current version, we strongly suggest that you start using the online version as soon as possible and that you uninstall your copy of JetPay Virtual Terminal from your computer. 

To schedule your migration to the new web based virtual terminal, contact us using one of the options below. If you are a recurring payments virtual terminal users, please download the Recurring Payments Migration Tool. 

  • Email: assist@jetpay.com
  • Toll Free: 800-834-4405 option 2 

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”eCommerce Merchants” tab_id=”1529962364486-360d956d-f04c”][vc_column_text el_id=”tlseol” el_class=”body1″]

Merchants With an Online Shopping Cart

Merchants that operate online web stores or process payments via a website that sends processing traffic directly to JetPay’s front end will need to verify that their TLS certificate is updated to TLS v1.2 and that their SSL certificate is better than SSL v3. 

 

Sample Upgrade Methods

Apache Version 2.2 and Above

Enable TLS 1.2 Only in Apache
First, edit the VirtualHost section for your domain in Apache SSL configuration file on your server and set the SSLProtocol as following. This will disable all older protocols and your Apache server and enable TLSv1.2 only.

TSLProtocol -all +TLSv1.2

The simplest Apache VirtualHost with SSL looks like below

<VirtualHost *:443>
    ServerName www.example.com
    DocumentRoot /var/www/html
    SSLEngine on
    SSLProtocol -all +TLSv1.2
    SSLCertificateFile /etc/letsencrypt/live/example.com/cert.pem
    SSLCertificateKeyFile /etc/letsencrypt/live/example.com/privkey.pem
</VirtualHost>

NOTE: The above information is provided as an example only you will need to consult your Apache configuration and version information for correct settings and commands. You MUST be on Apache 2.2 or later to configure TLS v1.2 on your server. If you are not on Apache 2.2 you will need to update your Apache environment prior to setting up TLS v 1.2[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”custom” accent_color=”#7e7e83″][vc_column_text el_id=”tlseol2″ el_class=”body1″]

Windows Server 2008 R2 and IIS 7.5


Backup Registry Settings
We strongly recommend taking a backup of the registry before making any changes. Use below link to find steps to how to export registry values. 

How to add, modify, or delete registry subkeys and values by using a .reg file

Enable TLS v1.2 on Windows
You have two options to enable TLS version on your system.

Option 1 – Merge Registry File

Download the Enable-TLS12-Windows.reg and Enable-TLS12-TLS11-Windows.reg files on your Windows system. 
Now right click on file and click Merge.

NOTE: You must validate the .reg files prior to merging and committing to your environment. JetPay can not guarantee that the configurations will work with your install or configuration. 
Always use caution before modifying registry entries. If in doubt use Option 2.

Option 2 – Manually Update Registry

You can do this by directly editing the registry file manually.

2.1  Open the registry editor on your server by running ‘regedit‘ in a command line window and navigate to below location.

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\SecurityProviders\SCHANNEL\Protocols

2.2  Add the TLS 1.2 key under Protocols. It will looks like directories

2.3 Now create two keys Client and Server under both TLS keys.

2.4 Now create the DWORD Values under Server and Client key as following

  DisabledByDefault [Value = 0]
  Enabled [Value = 1]

Disable TLS and SSL Older Versions
3.1 Open registry on your server by running “regedit” in run window and navigate to the below location. 
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\SecurityProviders\SCHANNEL\Protocols

3.2 Now change DWORD Values under Server and Client to TLS 1.0, SSL 3.0 and Older SSL version keys

DisabledByDefault [Value = 0]
Enabled [Value = 0]

After making the above changes reboot your server.

Remember:

  • Review the update information for your server type
  • Always backup your configuration files before starting any server level updates
  • Updating your SSL certificate will not update your TLS version

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”JetComm DLL Users” tab_id=”1529962407076-f73a951b-5d56″][vc_column_text]

JetPay’s Dynamic Link Library Package 

If you are an eCommerce merchant running Windows IIS and are using the JetPay DLL package in either .asp or asp.NET, you will need to update to the current release of the JetComm DLL Package. Please click the link below to submit your request. 

To request JetComm DLL Update Package:
Email devgroupmanager@jetpay.com with the subject “JetComm DLL Update Request.”

Remember:

  • If you are unable to use the link above send your request to
  • You will need to be running IIS 7.5 or greater
  • Ensure that the latest Windows dot.NET packages are installed on your Windows Server
  • Verify that your Windows Server is configured for TLS v1.2
  • Always backup your configuration files before starting any server level updates

NOTE: Due to the number of security enhancements in this new package you will need to thoroughly test your application to ensure that all previous hooks and connections from your application to the DLL package are working as expected. Refer to the DLL documentation for more information. [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1529099865296{padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

JetPay is committed to empowering organizations to be great employers.

Workforce Today® JetSource provides business with a complete solution that includes human resource outsourcing & support services

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”8513″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” disable_element=”yes” enable_overlay=”1″ overlay_image=”8513″ css=”.vc_custom_1529099795240{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;}”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1525468341944{padding-top: 45px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class=”container” css=”.vc_custom_1527627208614{margin-bottom: 85px !important;}”]

JetSource is a great way to ensure all of your human resource requirements are supported

[/vc_column_text][rev_slider_vc alias=”jetsource”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1525462999583{padding-top: 35px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

With Workforce Today® Jetsource We Have The Solution For Any Size Company

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” font_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1525461877215{padding-top: 5vw !important;padding-right: 5vw !important;padding-bottom: 5vw !important;padding-left: 5vw !important;background-color: #2e909c !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Small Businesses

1-49 Employees

Small companies do well to run lean and mean. JetPay is the answer for keeping on top of staff and running an efficient and hassle free administration. Our simple HR & Payroll solutions are built with busy managers like you in mind. We help you to run an orderly workplace while saving you time and money in the process.

 

learn more

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1525461899566{padding-top: 5vw !important;padding-right: 5vw !important;padding-bottom: 5vw !important;padding-left: 5vw !important;background-color: #2eabad !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Medium Businesses

50-499 Employees

Hiring, Payroll, HR, Compliance, Time & Attendance; all these tools are neatly packaged in one amazing solution created to help you better manage and pay your employees. When your traditional processes are bogged down with paper it takes longer to get things done. It’s time to say goodbye to the paper trail and hello to smarter processes today.

 

learn more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1525461923413{padding-top: 5vw !important;padding-right: 5vw !important;padding-bottom: 5vw !important;padding-left: 5vw !important;background-color: #16c6dc !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Large Businesses

500+ Employees

Harness smart work flow integration by leveraging the power of Workforce Today®. If you want to super-charge collaboration and trim away inefficiencies, JetPay’s Human Capital Management (HCM) platform is for you. Facilitate better communication, improve productivity, and get expert HR & Payroll solutions in one platform.

 

learn more

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1525463032739{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 90px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Work smarter, not harder

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]Workforce Today® Jetsource is your secret weapon for thriving in a competitive market. By engaging your staff and eliminating repetitive tasks, your employees are empowered to work in a more efficient manner. Additionally, with productivity reports created in Workforce Today® Jetsource, you can analyze costs and returns with a side by side view right from your dashboard.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

Competitive Solutions

A single provider of payment services for all departments for all payment channels. This improves the experience for both your constituents and contract management.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]

Endless Integrations

We offer integrations with your software systems as well as a REST API to support additional integrations to JetPay’s processing platform.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]

Implementation Expertise

Implementation teams specialize in government services agencies and understands the complexity of integrations and requirements for onboarding efficiently.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]

System Stability

Industry leader in service up-time with continuous proven stability. Extensive systems management and security to process payments without service interruption.

TECHNOLOGY FOR EVERY PAYMENT CHANNEL

[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” parallax=”content-moving” css=”.vc_custom_1525374485412{padding-top: 75px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-image: url(https://www.jetpay.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/05/jetpay_partners_12.jpg?id=7915) !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat;background-size:cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”7/12″][vc_column_text]

Building Partnerships That Add Value

We deliver more for partners. As a direct payment processor and human capital management company, we help make complex simple for our partners and their clients. JetPay has dedicated, experienced professionals that understand how partnerships work. Enterprise partners, Referral Partners, Integration Partners and Traditional Resellers – we serve all partnerships 

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text el_class=”text-right”]Interested In Payments Partnership

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”text-right”]Become an HR & Payroll Reseller [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/12″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1522784464585{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

The Opportunities Are Endless

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1522786913950{padding-right: 15% !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Make the Most of Your Partnership. When looking at the needs of any business today, the opportunities to bring payments and HR & payroll services to your clients is endless. JetPay currently partners with Independent Sales Organizations (ISOs), Independent Software Vendors (ISVs), and Value Added Resellers (VARs), Referral Partners, and Financial Institutions.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1526001106251{margin-top: 30px !important;}” el_class=”text-right”]Learn More[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″][vc_single_image image=”7910″ img_size=”large” css=”.vc_custom_1525368630699{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1525374722060{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #dfdfdf !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1525374197904{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}”]

Our Goal is Making Complex Simple

Agents and ISOs

Offer your clients direct payment processing, payroll services with extensive technology solutions and compliance support. If you want to manage the back office or the whole enterprise we can structure an agreement that works.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”7917″ img_size=”400×267″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1526586782738{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}”]

Technology Providers

A partnership that delivers direct processing and no middleman. We make complex simple and and integrations more efficient and creates fewer touch points which can be more secured, has lower fees and offers higher residuals.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”7911″ img_size=”400×267″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1526571424819{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}”]

Software Vendors

As one of the few direct payment processing companies, JetPay can get your customers up and running in less time with a lot less hassle. JetPay has the integration knowledge and experts from beginning to end, it’s where we started.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1522785416239{padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”7919″ img_size=”400×267″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1526571451408{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}”]

Enterprise eCommerce

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”7918″ img_size=”400×267″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1522787405049{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}”]

Value Added Resellers

Cost-competitive, easy-to-sell, PCI-compliant payment processing solutions won’t just attract customers—they’ll keep them loyal. For complete turn key solutions, we’re the name to know.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”7916″ img_size=”400×267″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1522787387133{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}”]

Financial Institutions

We help financial institutions deliver tailored payment solutions based on your unique needs. We deliver a partnership relationship that creates strong revenue growth while providing a great customer experience.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”7914″ img_size=”400×267″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1526587338422{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}”]

Professional Services

As a Professional Services firm your clients trust you and providing additional solutions builds deeper relationships that will make a lasting impact for you and your clients. A JetPay partnership helps you retain business and earns referral fees.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”7912″ img_size=”400×267″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1525350932673{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}”]

Franchises

We serve both sides of your business – people and payments. EMV Mobile Devices - WisePad 2 Plus

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”6729″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_message css=”.vc_custom_1526483187025{margin-right: 50px !important;margin-left: 50px !important;}”]

Coming soon.

[/vc_message][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1501817590803{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_text]The WisePad 2 Plus features an integrated printer, making it ideal for merchants that want to provide customers with a paper receipt — a featurethat is especially important for businesses that sell valuable goods and services or that don’t want to take the time to capture signatures and type in email addresses.

Robust security and proven PTS-P2PE compliant SRED technology combine to protect cardholder data, ensuring that account information is never stored in the device, phone or tablet. WisePad 2 pairs with all popular mobile devices running iOS, Android or Windows, and communicates via Bluetooth.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”7874″ img_size=”182×240″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://www.jetpay.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/05/jetpay_wisepad_2_specsheet.pdf”][vc_btn title=”Download Specsheet” style=”custom” custom_background=”#ff6600″ custom_text=”#ffffff” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-angle-double-down” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.jetpay.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2018%2F05%2Fjetpay_wisepad_2_specsheet.pdf||target:%20_blank|”][vc_btn title=”Get More Information” style=”custom” custom_background=”#03899c” custom_text=”#ffffff” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-angle-double-down” add_icon=”true” link=”url:mailto%3Asales.team%40jetpay.com%3Fsubject%3DTerminal%20Inquiry%20-%20%2522Wise%20Pad%202%20Plus%2522|||”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1501817647240{background-color: #f9f9f9 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_raw_html]JTNDYSUyMGlkJTNEJTIyd2lzZXBhZDIlMjIlM0UlM0MlMkZhJTNF[/vc_raw_html]

EMV Mobile Devices - WisePad 2

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”6728″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_message css=”.vc_custom_1526483241005{margin-right: 50px !important;margin-left: 50px !important;}”]

Coming soon.

[/vc_message][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1501817590803{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_text]The WisePad 2 is a hand-held mobile device that supports Chip & PIN,Chip & Sign and magnetic stripe payment technologies.

Robust security and proven PTS-P2PE compliant SRED technology combine to protect cardholder data, ensuring that account information is never stored in the device, phone or tablet. WisePad 2 pairs with all popular mobile devices running iOS, Android or Windows, and communicates via Bluetooth.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”7874″ img_size=”182×240″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://www.jetpay.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/05/jetpay_wisepad_2_specsheet.pdf”][vc_btn title=”Download Specsheet” style=”custom” custom_background=”#ff6600″ custom_text=”#ffffff” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-angle-double-down” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.jetpay.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2018%2F05%2Fjetpay_wisepad_2_specsheet.pdf||target:%20_blank|”][vc_btn title=”Get More Information” style=”custom” custom_background=”#03899c” custom_text=”#ffffff” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-angle-double-down” add_icon=”true” link=”url:mailto%3Asales.team%40jetpay.com%3Fsubject%3DTerminal%20Inquiry%20-%20%2522Wise%20Pad%202%2522|||”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_raw_html]JTNDYSUyMGlkJTNEJTIyY2hpcHBlcjJ4JTIyJTNFJTNDJTJGYSUzRQ==[/vc_raw_html]

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”6736″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_message css=”.vc_custom_1526483250207{margin-right: 50px !important;margin-left: 50px !important;}”]

Coming soon.

[/vc_message][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1501817590803{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Chipper 2X is a compact, powerful card reader that supports EMV Chip & Sign magstripe payment technologies.

Chipper 2X comes with Bluetooth/Micro USB technology. For convenience, a removable sticky pad is available to firmly adhere the Bluetooth version to a paired device as well as a lanyard.

Chipper 2X’s embedded card reader expands a merchant’s ability to process card-present transactions anytime, anywhere via swipe or dip. The device is also well suited for enterprise applications, whether part of a fixed tablet POS, or when integrated with mobile line-busting and tableside payment applications.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”7931″ img_size=”182×240″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://www.jetpay.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/05/jetpay_chipper2x_specsheet.pdf”][vc_btn title=”Download Specsheet” style=”custom” custom_background=”#ff6600″ custom_text=”#ffffff” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-angle-double-down” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.jetpay.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2018%2F05%2Fjetpay_chipper2x_specsheet.pdf||target:%20_blank|”][vc_btn title=”Get More Information” style=”custom” custom_background=”#03899c” custom_text=”#ffffff” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-angle-double-down” add_icon=”true” link=”url:mailto%3Asales.team%40jetpay.com%3Fsubject%3DTerminal%20Inquiry%20-%20%2522bbpos%20Chipper%202x%2522|||”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Job Scammers – FRAUD ALERT
It has been reported to us, that scammers are offering fraudulent JetPay jobs. 
 
Open positions with JetPay are listed with specific service providers and can be viewed on our website at: https://www.jetpay.com/careers/ when you click “Job Listings” 
 
JetPay will not ask you to process check from home or purchase your own materials. 
 
If you have responded to a fraudulent jodb, please file a complaint with the  Federal Trade Commission (FTC) at https://www.ftccomplaintassistant.gov/#crnt&panel1-1 To learn more about the signs of a job scam go to: https://www.consumer.ftc.gov/articles/0243-job-scams

title.rendered: Visa Cardholder-Initiated Transaction (CIT) Credentials On File and Merchant-Initiated Transaction (MIT) Rules Change

content.rendered:
Effective October 2017, Visa has defined rule changes for Merchants and their third-party agents, or payment facilitators that offer cardholders the opportunity to store their credentials on file.

A stored credential is information (including, but not limited to, an account number or payment token) that is stored by a merchant to process future transactions. An example is a merchant who processes recurring billing transactions. They typically store a customer credit number and expiration date to submit regularly scheduled future transactions for products and services.

The rules changing for merchants are:

  • Disclose to cardholders how those credentials will be used.
  • Obtain cardholders’ consent to store the credentials.
  • Notify cardholders when any changes are made to the terms of use.

The Merchant Preferred program is a value added program providing merchants with real, measurable, money-saving discounts they can use daily from recognized brands.  When using the Merchant Preferred Program, merchants can save up to 85% on products and services including travel, office supplies, shipping, payroll services, car rental, and more.

About the Program

The Merchant Preferred Program is an easy-to-use, web-based volume discount pricing program. Participating merchants can save up to 85% on a wide variety of products and services from over 100 brand name suppliers, including shipping, travel and office supplies. It is available to merchants of all sizes.

With a low monthly cost and the ability for merchants to not only save on services they use everyday in their business but being about to allow friends, family and employees access provides greater value.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

24/7 Access

The easy to use Merchant Preferred web portal provides 24/7/365 access to the services, features and information about your account. You can access anytime on your computer, table or phone.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

No Limits

There is no limit to the number of programs you can subscribe, subscribe to one - subscribe to all. Pick and chose what offers are best for you and your business.

[/vc_column][/vc_row]

Affordable Care Act Solution

JetPay simplifies Affordable Care Act compliance.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”container landing-page-pre-footer” css=”.vc_custom_1502301873577{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]Your business cannot afford to take a risk with ACA reporting. Making beginners’ mistakes with collecting eligibility and participation data or relying on multiple systems for reporting is a risk not worth taking. Any chance of errors or missed deadlines put you at risk of non-compliance.

You need a simple solution that will analyze payroll data and employee eligibility to produce applicable tax forms and file them automatically. JetPay’s ACA solution handles it all.

Our ACA features have got you “covered.”

  • Dashboard – Monitor ACA eligibility from the executive dashboard. Change employee eligibility status as needed.
  • Draft Versions – Access drafts of 1094-C and 1095-C forms to verify pre-filled data.
  • Data Records – You can designate aggregate group membership, minimum essential coverage, and minimum value coverage.
  •  HR Workplace – Our experts are here to support you. Opt for HR Workplace for updates about regulatory changes, explained. Ask questions and receive personalized answers to your pressing ACA compliance questions.

Workforce Today®, a single-database solution, eliminates the workload and potential for errors innate to manual entry. ACA requirements are relatively newer mandates with costly penalties which can leave you feeling uncertain of yourself.  Let JetPay take the guess work out of ACA filing.  Get started today![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”landing-forms” css=”.vc_custom_1502300891058{background-color: rgba(238,238,238,0.6) !important;*background-color: rgb(238,238,238) !important;}”]

  • GET COMPLIANT TODAY!

PAX S80 - Countertop Payment Terminal

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4957″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1501817590803{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_text]PAX’s S80 is an advanced countertop POS terminal which combines innovation, durability and high performance to assure faster, more reliable transactions.

The PCI PTS 3.x approved S80 offers advanced connectivity, equipped with various communication technologies such as Dial and Ethernet. An intuitive ATM style interface and ergonomic keypad make operation easier for merchant and consumer alike.

The S80 comes with powerful ARM11 processor and optional built-in contactless, enabling support for multiple payment and value-added applications, making this countertop terminal one of the most reliable in the world.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”6412″ img_size=”182×240″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://www.jetpay.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/jetpay_pax_s80_specsheet.pdf”][vc_btn title=”Download Specsheet” style=”custom” custom_background=”#ff6600″ custom_text=”#ffffff” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-angle-double-down” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.jetpay.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2017%2F09%2Fjetpay_pax_s80_specsheet.pdf||target:%20_blank|”][vc_btn title=”Get More Information” style=”custom” custom_background=”#03899c” custom_text=”#ffffff” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-angle-double-down” add_icon=”true” link=”url:mailto%3Asales.team%40jetpay.com%3Fsubject%3DTerminal%20Inquiry%20-%20%2522Pax%20S80%2522|||”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1501817647240{background-color: #f9f9f9 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_raw_html]JTNDYSUyMGlkJTNEJTIyczkwJTIyJTNFJTNDJTJGYSUzRQ==[/vc_raw_html]

With multiple communication options such as single SIM or dual SIM GPRS, CDMA, WiFi and 3G, as well as large memory and high capacity Li-ion rechargeable battery, the S90 is one of the most popular mobile terminals for merchants today.

The S90 comes with inbuilt contactless, PCI PTS 4.x certification and delivers secure transactions using an ARM11 processor to support DUKPT, Master/Session and 3DES.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”6413″ img_size=”182×240″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://www.jetpay.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/jetpay_pax_s90_specsheet.pdf”][vc_btn title=”Download Specsheet” style=”custom” custom_background=”#ff6600″ custom_text=”#ffffff” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-angle-double-down” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.jetpay.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2017%2F09%2Fjetpay_pax_s90_specsheet.pdf||target:%20_blank|rel:nofollow”][vc_btn title=”Get More Information” style=”custom” custom_background=”#03899c” custom_text=”#ffffff” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-angle-double-down” add_icon=”true” link=”url:mailto%3Asales.team%40jetpay.com%3Fsubject%3DTerminal%20Inquiry%20-%20%2522Pax%20S90%2522|||”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_raw_html]JTNDYSUyMGlkJTNEJTIyczMwMCUyMiUzRSUzQyUyRmElM0U=[/vc_raw_html]
