[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1497284098435{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Employee Self Service” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:24px|text_align:left|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”header text-uppercase font-weight-500″][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]The easiest way to manage payroll changes. Electronic work-flows for payroll changes are efficient and Eco-friendly. Employees submit changes using a friendly user interface. Changes are waiting in your queue to approve and commit to your payroll cycle.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1496871058577{padding-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Time And Attendance Optimization” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:30px|text_align:left|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”header text-uppercase font-weight-500″][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]Tracking time and attendance can improve operations and streamline labor costs. Monitor and change schedules on the fly and let employees check their schedule from home without calling someone. Production analytics give you the info you need to place the most efficient workers on critical shifts. Best of all, time flows seamlessly into payroll further boosting productivity.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″][vc_empty_space height=”45px”][vc_column_text]

  • Measure and reduce overtime
  • Simplify time-off requests
  • Reduce paperwork
  • Track ACA compliance
  • Automatic payroll integration
  • Flexible punch in and out options

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-user-md” add_icon=”true” title=”Benefits & ACA” tab_id=”1496381979276-61baa425-b0911781-993a0063-623c”][vc_empty_space height=”70px”][vc_custom_heading text=”An Open Enrollment Work Flow Everyone Is Sure To Love” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:center|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”header text-uppercase font-weight-500″][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]

Take the frustration out of benefits administration. Open enrollment period is a crunch time if you’re not using a smart HCM platform. JetPay simplifies the entire benefits enrollment process so you can get back to managing people faster.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1496871558755{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Give Power To The People” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:24px|text_align:left|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”header text-uppercase font-weight-500″][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]We partner with the top brokers in the industry so your employees have all the information they need to enroll for benefits. With JetPay’s single database solution, staff benefit selections are automatically reflected in the payroll system. Doing this, there’s no collection of paper forms, no more manual entry, and no more frustration.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1497284072228{padding-top: 45px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”Total Benefit Reporting Regulations Compliance” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:30px|text_align:center|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”header text-uppercase font-weight-500″][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]

Today the United States government regulates participation, as well as the reporting, of all of those involved in receiving, or denying, benefits. It is the law. Our system was designed using input from experienced benefits managers. We provide the tools to stay compliant with ACA, ERISA, and COBRA. Further, our ACA solution simplifies tracking, compliance, and filing. It will analyze payroll data and employee eligibility to produce applicable tax forms and file them automatically.

JetPay’s ACA solution handles it all.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”OUR ACA FEATURES HAVE GOT YOU COVERED” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:center|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”header text-uppercase font-weight-500″][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Dashboard

Monitor ACA eligibility from the executive dashboard. Change employee eligibility status as needed

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Draft versions

Access drafts of 1094-C and 1095-C forms to verify pre-filled data

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Data records

You can designate aggregate group membership, minimum essential coverage, and minimum value coverage

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

HR Workplace

Opt for HR Workplace for updates about regulatory changes, explained. Ask questions and receive personalized answers to your pressing ACA compliance questions

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”105px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1496261037856{background-color: #03899c !important;}”][vc_column width=”9/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Say Goodbye to the Paper Trail” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:38px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”font-weight-500″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/12″][vc_column_text]

Request A Demo!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” parallax=”content-moving” parallax_image=”3632″ parallax_speed_bg=”2″ enable_overlay=”1″ el_class=”page-title-extended page-title-parallax text-shadow-dark” overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.3)”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1500061810126{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_custom_heading text=”SMALL BUSINESSES” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.2″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal” el_class=”text-shadow-dark”][vc_custom_heading text=”Helping you manage your greatest investment” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:14px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:24px” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” el_class=”text-shadow-dark”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1497283241639{padding-top: 45px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs alignment=”center” active_section=”1″ no_fill_content_area=”true”][vc_tta_section i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-money” add_icon=”true” title=”Payroll” tab_id=”1496381979276-61baa425-b0911781-993a”][vc_empty_space height=”70px”][vc_custom_heading text=”A SIMPLE PAYROLL SOLUTION FOR GROWING BUSINESS” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:center|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”header text-uppercase font-weight-500″][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]

Small companies need to maximize resources by running lean and mean. JetPay empowers business owners to stay on top of compliance issues, manage staff and run an efficient and hassle free operation. Our simple solutions are built with busy owners and managers like you in mind. JetPay will help you run your workplace day-to-day while saving time and money in the process.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1496866187048{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Painless Payroll” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:24px|text_align:left|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”header text-uppercase font-weight-500″][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]Don’t spend hours on payroll, dealing with HR issues and time & attendance tracking. Your time and energy should be spent making your business a success. Our user-friendly platform coupled with a dedicated service specialist will make the process effortless. Thousands of small businesses across the country rely on JetPay to run their payroll and manage their payroll tax filing.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”You Deserve To Be Next!” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:21px|text_align:left|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Nothing%20You%20Could%20Do%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” el_class=”lead font-nothing-you-could-do text-uppercase font-weight-600″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”Made For Busy Business Owners Like You” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:center|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”header text-uppercase font-weight-500″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1497283557504{padding-right: 5px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”]

Tax filing

We will deposit and file all of the required payroll taxes
– Federal, State(s), and Local(s) –
including EIT and LST as part of our Payroll Tax Filing Service. We take full responsibility and ensure the burden of managing taxes is off your plate.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Mobile

Cloud based convenience lets you securely run payroll from your office, home, or on the go.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Paperless payroll

Coupled with employee direct deposit, payroll cards and Employee Self Service, leaves nothing for you to print or distribute. Your reports are available 24/7 Online or on your mobile device.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1497283566578{padding-right: 5px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”]

Automated

Set your payroll to auto-run. We’ll notify you when your payroll runs and reports are available to view, download, or export to another ledger.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Easy set-up

Our experts make the conversion from your present system easy and headache-free. We pay attention to the details and take special care to see the process is completed quickly and thoroughly.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Employee Self Service

Enable employees to get important documents Online and via mobile devices without needing assistance from you or your staff. Employees gain access to pay stubs, W-2s, and 1099s through their own secure portal.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1497283573960{padding-right: 5px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”]

Reports

Access a plethora of standard payroll reports or choose the option to build your own.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

General ledger

Transfer payroll data into bookkeeping applications and share with your CPA – another tool to increase productivity.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

White-glove service

Our exemplary customer service is what puts us ahead of the competition. Our white-glove, concierge service boasts a 98% customer satisfaction rating and that is no accident, it’s a result of our expertise coupled with a drive to innovate.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-users” add_icon=”true” title=”HR & Hiring” tab_id=”1496866458973-cd69bea5-f9b9″][vc_empty_space height=”70px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Right Sized Hr Solutions For Your Small Business” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:center|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”header text-uppercase font-weight-500″][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]

Just because you run a small business it doesn’t exempt you from HR compliance issues. What you don’t know can hurt you and while you may not have extra capital to hire an HR expert, hiring JetPay gives you access to the resources necessary to succeed.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1496866187048{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Expert Hr Tools And Advice” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:24px|text_align:left|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”header text-uppercase font-weight-500″][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]When using JetPay, you’ll gain free access to our cloud-based HR Support Center. On-demand access to information on state and federal labor laws, sample HR policies and access to HR best practices. JetPay’s resources are continually updated and always current. Search our robust Q & A Database to see the questions and answer to a wide variety of HR related issues. Plus, gain access to thousands of forms, documents, tools, and checklists with up-to-date news you need to take the mystery out of human resource practices – all at your fingertips.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1496867316117{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”6/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Supercharge Your Hiring Process” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:24px|text_align:left|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”header text-uppercase font-weight-500″][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]As a small business, making mistakes during the hiring process can be extremely costly. We can help you manage the hiring process effortlessly with an easy to use hiring process application; JetPay Hire, powered by GetHired. Our user-friendly application guides you through the hiring process life-cycle – from posting the position, to vetting shortlisted candidates, you can move quicker than your competition. Leverage the paperless employee on-boarding tools to automate all your new hire processing so your new employees show up their first day to work, ready to get to work as opposed to filling out paperwork.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][vc_empty_space height=”1px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1496868550662{padding-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Stress Free Hr” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:24px|text_align:left|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”header text-uppercase font-weight-500″][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]Reduce the time it takes to complete and store employee-related paperwork. Allow employees to easily submit payroll changes. Supervisors can quickly approve and submit employee changes for processing. Plus, securely store and track important document changes making compliance audits a breeze.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-clock-o” add_icon=”true” title=”Time Keeping” tab_id=”1496867725017-2d27ca6c-84a3″][vc_empty_space height=”70px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Time And Attendance Tracking For Small Businesses” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:center|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”header text-uppercase font-weight-500″][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]

The bottom line is manual tracking of time and attendance slows down your bottom line. Paper processes are not productive, less accurate and take time away from growing your business. JetPay’s time & attendance management solution helps eliminate paper by providing you with a more efficient way to collect and track employee time.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1496868331323{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Increase Productivity & Improve Business Performance” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:24px|text_align:left|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”header text-uppercase font-weight-500″][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]When using JetPay, you’ll gain free access to our cloud-based HR Support Center. On-demand access to information on state and federal labor laws, sample HR policies and access to HR best practices. JetPay’s resources are continually updated and always current. Search our robust Q & A Database to see the questions and answer to a wide variety of HR related issues. Plus, gain access to thousands of forms, documents, tools, and checklists with up-to-date news you need to take the mystery out of human resource practices – all at your fingertips.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]Plus, gain access to thousands of forms, documents, tools, and checklists with up-to-date news you need to take the mystery out of human resource practices – all at your fingertips.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Features That Can Help You Get More Done Every Day” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:center|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”header text-uppercase font-weight-500″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1496882275818{padding-right: 5px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”]

Automation

Automatic tracking of accruals that calculate per hour, per diem, per pay, or per month – you choose.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1496882313488{padding-right: 5px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”]

Effortless payroll

Eliminate manual entry of employee hours and complete payroll in a fraction of the time.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1496882328806{padding-right: 5px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”]

Alerts and notification

Customize alerts to manage the timing and duration of hours worked. Set up notifications for: schedule changes, lateness, leaving early, working over allocated hours, working too few hours.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1496882422740{padding-right: 5px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”]

Monitoring

Monitor and manage overtime and meal breaks.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1496882377823{padding-right: 5px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”]

Fraud controls

Intelligent systems track and monitor punches to identify troublesome patterns. Alerts put an end to “buddy punching” and the like.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1496882386002{padding-right: 5px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”1px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”140px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1496261037856{background-color: #03899c !important;}”][vc_column width=”9/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Supercharge Your Business” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:38px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”font-weight-500″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/12″][vc_column_text]

get started today

At the core of JetPay’s people-first philosophy, we consider our solutions, and our personnel, supporting characters in your story. JetPay doesn’t just build solutions, we establish and enhance relationships.

Simplify ACA Management

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text animation=”fadeInUp” el_class=”lead”]You can’t afford to take a risk with ACA reporting – to fulfill compliance while reducing risk, you must consolidate your business services.To keep ahead of the reporting game, JetPay offers the perfect solution:

To keep ahead of the reporting game, JetPay offers the perfect solution:

  • Analyze payroll data
  • Monitor employee eligibility status
  • Produce
  • File applicable tax forms;

these are just a few of the functions offered when using JetPay as your ACA solution.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content”][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1497283036604{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://www.jetpay.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/aca-caculation.jpg?id=3542) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”500px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1496181037780{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn” el_class=”lead”]

We’ll do the filing

JetPay automatically collects the required information and generates your 1094-C and 1095-C forms through your employee benefits data in Workforce Today®. This process eliminates errors that often occur when conducting manual entry. Our ACA experts review documents to ensure both forms are complete and 100% accurate. Keep your company in-line with all regulations and stay headache free when you use JetPay.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1497283016926{padding-top: 115px !important;padding-bottom: 115px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Stay compliant, simplify paperwork, and avoid costly penalties” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:center|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeIn” el_class=”text-medium font-weight-500 text-center”][vc_empty_space height=”70px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Dashboard
    Monitor ACA eligibility from your executive dashboard and update eligible employees whenever you need to.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • HR Workplace
    You have the option to keep up with regulatory changes and receive live HR answers to your pressing ACA compliance questions.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Data Records
    You can designate aggregate group membership, minimum essential coverage and minimum value coverage.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Draft Versions
    Run on demand ACA annual forms to verify pre-filled data.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Annual 1095-C
    We’ll produce forms for employee distribution and also make the forms available in employee self serve.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Forms 1094-C and 1095-C
    We’ll auto-populate, produce and file forms electronically to the IRS on your behalf.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1497647395072{background-color: #03899c !important;}”][vc_column width=”9/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Simplify your ACA management today!” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:38px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”font-weight-500″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/12″][vc_column_text]

[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” parallax=”content-moving-fade” parallax_image=”3532″ enable_overlay=”1″ el_class=”page-title-extended page-title-parallax text-shadow-dark” overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.3)”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1500061392523{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_custom_heading text=”PAYROLL & TAX FILING” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1497250672075{padding-top: 45px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text animation=”fadeInUp” el_class=”heading heading-center m-b-40″]

Get to payday the easier way

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text animation=”fadeInUp” el_class=”lead”]Paying your staff is so much more than tallying time sheets and cutting checks. There is time to collect, deductions to charge, and demographics to update.

How much time do you spend calculating hours worked and time off? We know from experience that payroll calculations can take hours to complete.

Today, with JetPay’s single-database HCM platform, your payroll will run faster with more accuracy and efficiency.

With automation in mind, our tools were modeled after the work flows considered best-practice in the payroll industry. Now you have more time to grow your business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1497250716082{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://www.jetpay.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/mid-market-business-hcm-hr-payroll-time-jetpay.jpg?id=3533) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”500px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1497251088812{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”70px”][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn” el_class=”lead”]

The Only Constant

Is change … Say goodbye to manually entering stacks of change forms. When you manage benefits and salaries there are always modifications to be made. There’s a better way to manage payroll changes with JetPay. We have created a simple interface for employees to create and submit payroll changes. Simply review and commit approved changes to your next payroll cycle. Lighten your workload and save paper with employee self-service.

Help staff to help themselves.

Why act as a gatekeeper when employees can access payroll and benefit information themselves? Lighten your workload and save paper with employee self-service.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1496263997532{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;background-image: url(https://www.jetpay.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/investor-relations-jetpay.jpg?id=3525) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” font_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”WE’RE PART OF YOUR TEAM” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”text-uppercase text-medium-light”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]Every business is assigned a dedicated representative. We will work with you to ensure your payroll is accurate pay after pay. As your business grows, our solution and team will grow with you. We continually evaluate your needs to determine the best technology for your business, so you are always covered.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1496263511130{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Powering your productivity” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:center|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeIn” el_class=”text-medium font-weight-500 text-center”][vc_empty_space height=”70px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Tax filing
    We will deposit and file all of the required payroll taxes – Federal, State(s), and Local(s) – including EIT and LST as part of our Payroll Tax Filing Service.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • New hire reporting
    We’ll file on your behalf or provide you with a report to file on your own, either way you’ll meet the federal requirements for filing new hires.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Employee Self Service
    Employees gain access to pay-stubs, W-2s, and more – saving you both time.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Implementation
    Our experts make the conversion from your present system feel like a breeze.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • General ledger
    Transfer payroll data into bookkeeping applications – another tool to increase productivity.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Reports
    Access a plethora of standard payroll reports or choose the option to build your own.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • White-glove service
    Our exemplary customer service is what puts us ahead of the competition. 98% customer satisfaction is no accident, it’s part of our DNA.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • HR Support CenterGain access to an Online HR knowledge base, plus receive important regulatory and compliance alerts.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1497250985275{background-color: #03899c !important;}”][vc_column width=”9/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Streamline your payroll process today!” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:38px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”font-weight-500″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/12″][vc_column_text]

SCHEDULING” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.2″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1497249980768{padding-top: 45px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text animation=”fadeInUp” el_class=”heading heading-center m-b-40″]

It’s all About being efficient

Increase productivity and business performance

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text animation=”fadeInUp” el_class=”lead”]

Paper tracking employee time and attendance slows down productivity. Our time and attendance management solution helps eliminate paper by providing you with a more efficient way to collect and track employee time.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1497250195639{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://www.jetpay.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/benefits-hr-and-payroll-jetpay.jpg?id=3520) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”500px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1496181037780{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn” el_class=”lead”]

More Accurate

Stop overworking yourself. Tracking time and managing schedules is redundant. We’ve made automating multiple tasks simple. All of your tracking and scheduling needs are packaged into one easy–to-use solution. Our dashboards are loaded with the data you need to keep everyone on the same page.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1497250160677{padding-top: 115px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Control Features” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:center|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeIn” el_class=”text-medium font-weight-500 text-center”][vc_empty_space height=”70px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

    • Automation
      Automatically track accruals the easy way. JetPay understands you need a system that fits your existing policies. Customize your reports to tally per hour, per diem, per pay, or per month. So long, spreadsheets!

 

  • Monitoring
    Customize the system to monitor overtime or schedule meal breaks automatically.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

    • Effortless payroll
      Automation does away with time-consuming data entry and eliminates the possibility of clerical errors. JetPay has eliminated the need to manually key in hours and wages. With our smart system, you will complete payroll in a fraction of the time.

 

  • Fraud controls
    Intelligent systems track and monitor punches to identify troublesome patterns. Alerts put an end to “buddy punching” and the like.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Alerts and notification
    You don’t have to watch over the punch clock when it’s integrated with your HR and Payroll dashboard. Customize alerts to manage the timing and duration of hours worked. Set up notifications for:
  • Schedule changes
  • Lateness
  • Leaving early
  • Working over allocated hours
  • Working too few hours

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1496263648766{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-image: url(https://www.jetpay.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/investor-relations-jetpay.jpg?id=3525) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” font_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”MANAGING THE MOBILE WORKFORCE” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:50px|text_align:right|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”text-uppercase text-medium-light”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]More and more office-based businesses are seeing the benefit of hiring telecommuting workers. Services operating out of brick and mortar locations can benefit from electronic HR features, too.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1497250515853{background-color: #03899c !important;}”][vc_column width=”9/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Ready to increase your productivity?” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:38px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” css_animation=”none” el_class=”font-weight-500″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/12″][vc_column_text]

[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” parallax=”content-moving-fade” parallax_image=”3475″ el_class=”page-title-extended”][vc_column css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1500059694213{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_custom_heading text=”FRAUD & SECURITY” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1496969047171{padding-top: 45px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text animation=”fadeInUp” el_class=”heading heading-center m-b-40″]

Think security

Our #1 Priority

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text animation=”fadeInUp” el_class=”lead”]Accepting more types of payments sets you apart from competitors. JetPay has developed fast and reliable solutions to increase your bottom line. Whether you need a stand-alone terminal or fully integrated point-of-sale (POS) system, we have all the equipment you need to securely accept all card types at any time, anywhere.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” parallax=”content-moving-fade” parallax_image=”3478″ css=”.vc_custom_1496969039283{padding-top: 115px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;}” font_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column width=”5/12″][vc_empty_space height=”1px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”7/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Encryption” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:right|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”heading-jumbo”][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]

Secure Tokenization is one of many security features JetPay employs to help keep your cardholders’ data secure. Handled by our PCI-compliant algorithms and encryption, the sensitive data is kept under maximum security while a unique token is placed on your system in the place of card numbers. These tokens cannot be engineered back to the card, leaving hackers and unauthorized individuals with useless data.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1496969556999{padding-top: 115px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Greater Security, Greater Opportunity” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:center|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeIn” el_class=”text-medium font-weight-500 text-center”][vc_empty_space height=”70px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Trust
    More customers trusting you with their details mean higher sales.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Savings
    No more third party Token Service Providers – one less expense and point of failure

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Authenticity
    Fewer problems with Issuers over chargebacks, reimbursement and legal action.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

  • Expansion
    With card data now secure, you could move more processes and systems to the cloud.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Card On File
    Recurring payments, repeat purchases and refunds are easier and more secure.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Easier Compliance
    Note storing cardholder data can go a long way in reducing your PCI overhead.

[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” parallax=”content-moving-fade” parallax_image=”3468″ enable_overlay=”1″ el_class=”page-title-extended page-title-parallax text-shadow-dark” overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.3)”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1500059069851{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_custom_heading text=”Batch Processing” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.2″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1496968324440{padding-top: 45px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text animation=”fadeInUp” el_class=”heading heading-center m-b-40″]

Not your typical processing

fast, flexible with features that work

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text animation=”fadeInUp” el_class=”lead”]Merchants with multiple credit card transactions can save time by utilizing our Batch Processing feature. Batch Processing allows merchants to upload a file directly into the JetPay Platform, eliminating the need to send each transaction individually.

How does it work?

JetPay receives the batch file, makes a single call to the network and receives approvals on all the transactions at once. This allows you to process faster and easier. It can also help convert some of your declines in to approvals![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” css=”.vc_custom_1496968377206{padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1496968416842{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://www.jetpay.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/batch-processing.jpg?id=3469) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”500px”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1496968424735{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]

50 to Infinity

 

For businesses with less than 50 transactions a day, batch processing is probably not necessary. If you process 50, 1000 or 10 million transactions every day, then batch processing is the most simple and efficient way to get through processing and get back to business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1496189046694{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Add On Features” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:center|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”text-medium font-weight-500 text-center wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_fadeIn”][vc_empty_space height=”70px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Account Updater
    Automatically updates renewals and card account changes so you don’t have to.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Transaction Recycling
    Automatically re-submits ‘soft declines’ for 12 days – meaning fewer service cancellations.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Transaction Clean Up
    Automatically updates renewals and card account changes so you don’t have to.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1496189612801{background-color: #ff6600 !important;}”][vc_column width=”9/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Process everything with batch processing” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:38px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”font-weight-500″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/12″][vc_column_text]

Get Started

The end of paper chaos

Ok Maybe not “the” end but it’s close

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text animation=”fadeInUp” el_class=”lead”]Our ePayables solution includes an extensive list of features designed to manage invoicing and payments in one simple electronic platform – so you can say goodbye to manual labor.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” css=”.vc_custom_1496967947274{padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1497389045362{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://www.jetpay.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/epayables.jpg?id=3461) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_empty_space height=”500px”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1497389059417{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn” el_class=”lead”]

Reporting Tools

 

Reporting tools provide shared insights your staff will love. These tools are designed for authorization/verification and reconciliation. Access to reports provides insights helping you make better business decisions.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1496189046694{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Control Features” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:center|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeIn” el_class=”text-medium font-weight-500 text-center”][vc_empty_space height=”70px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Verification
    Required verification/authorization at each level of the payment process.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Secure
    Encryption of critical vendor information including PII and bank account information.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

  • Access Control
    User profiles prohibit a single user form having access to more than one process in the payment cycle.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1496189612801{background-color: #ff6600 !important;}”][vc_column width=”9/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Easy & Secure eCommerce payments” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:38px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”font-weight-500″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/12″][vc_column_text]

Set it, forget it, get paid

Subscriptions, memberships, installments

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text animation=”fadeInUp” el_class=”lead”]If you bill clients on a set schedule, recurring payments are a huge time-saver. Providing recurring payments is an easy way to increase retention, grow loyalty and improve customer satisfaction – all while streamlining your payment processing and reducing operational expenses.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” css=”.vc_custom_1496966535067{padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1497388933516{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://www.jetpay.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/recurring-payments-jetpay-credit-card-payments.jpg?id=3454) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_empty_space height=”500px”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1497388901803{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn” el_class=”lead”]

Retain More Customers

 

Customers with automatic bill pay are less likely to cancel subscriptions and memberships. Businesses using Recurring Payments increases customer loyalty with up to a 24% boost in sales. Recurring Payments, coupled with Account Updater, reduces the amount of staff calls to collect late payments or change cardholder information.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1496189046694{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Cutting Operational Costs” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:center|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeIn” el_class=”text-medium font-weight-500 text-center wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_fadeIn”][vc_empty_space height=”70px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Account Updater

Automatically updates renewals and card account changes so you don’t have to.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Working for the Underserved

Small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) are underserved by technology. One major reason: lack of access to data. Business owners often can’t get data about their own business performance, let alone info about their markets and competitors. This problem is particularly acute for brick and mortar businesses, including retailers, service providers, restaurants, and the like. Legacy technology and the physical (as opposed to digital) interactions with customers make it harder to collect, store, access, and draw conclusions from data.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1496147916033{background-color: #ff6600 !important;}”][vc_column width=”9/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Start Working On The Dream Today!” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:38px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”font-weight-500″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/12″][vc_column_text]

Don’t miss that sale

Checks are still a popular option for payments

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]As far as payment technology has advanced, paper checks continue to be a widely-used form of payment – especially when it comes to recurring payments. Some customers use checks as a backup when they’ve lost their card and others simply prefer using the checkbook. By only accepting credit cards in store or online, you miss important sales revenue. Instead, use JetPay to process your ACH and electronic checks with one to two-day settlement.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” css=”.vc_custom_1496897644143{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1497388051010{padding-top: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://www.jetpay.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/ach-echeck-back-office.jpg?id=3424) !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_empty_space height=”500px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1496897888177{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]

Simplify your back-office

Businesses that continue to take paper checks are experiencing an increase of returned checks. Bounced checks create a costly administrative burden. JetPay helps you verify check processing at the point-of-sale with check approval in a matter of seconds.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1496897700507{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”ACH & eChecks Saves You Time and Money” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:center|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeIn” el_class=”text-medium font-weight-500 text-center”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Security That Matters

E.M.V (Europay, MasterCard and Visa)

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]Billions of dollars are lost annually in fraudulent transactions both online and in stores. Criminals are keeping pace with credit card security developments. With the adoption of EMV in the U.S. and the added security of tokenization and end-to-end encryption, that number has started to decline dramatically. JetPay leads the field in the adoption of EMV with “Chip-N-Dip” ready terminals and some of the industry’s most advanced prevention measures to defeat credit card crime.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1510964543633{padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” width=”5/12″][vc_single_image image=”3416″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” width=”7/12″][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]

The Better Way To Fight Fraud

When a consumer makes an in-store purchase with a chip-enabled card, potential fraudulent activity occurs when your business is not using a chip-enabled reader.

Protect your business with JetPay’s full suite of tools including E.M.V capable readers, real-time security reporting, and tokenization.

Using EMV terminals reduces chargebacks due to fraudulent payments, gives confidence to your customers about their security, and discourages fraudulent activity.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1496147916033{background-color: #ff6600 !important;}”][vc_column width=”9/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”State of the Art Protection for your Business” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:38px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”font-weight-500″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/12″][vc_column_text]

It’s Perfect!

helping your customers find the perfect gift!

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]Want to help customers find the perfect gift? Offer prepaid cards for birthdays, holidays, giveaways or any occasion. Gift card purchases offer increased revenue, and JetPay can help incorporate this solution into your business. Government | Utilities | Political | Non-Profit

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text animation=”fadeInUp” el_class=”lead”]The MAGICSM Platform is the industry’s most flexibly-designed payment and data processor. MAGIC’sSM outbound communications suite provides a variety of options for customers to pay their statements on their mobile/web devices. It offers all types of electronic payment methods and virtually unlimited customizable reports. MAGICSM is handled by our PCI Compliant Level One Platform.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1510965905023{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”5/12″ offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”3391″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” width=”7/12″][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]

Stay Connected

The MAGICSM communications platform increases engagement via messages and alerts to your customers by text, email, and IVR. MAGICSM taps into the need for real-time communications with customers and clients, providing options to pay directly from the digital device of their choice.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”So Many Features” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:center|line_height:1.1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeIn” el_class=”text-medium font-weight-500 text-center”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text animation=”fadeInUp” el_class=”lead”]Online sales are estimated to hit 1.92 trillion U.S. dollars by 2018. Customers come back when they have an outstanding experience. Keep them coming back by making your online store stand out from the competition.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1497388766959{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://www.jetpay.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/ecommerce-user.jpg?id=3351) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_empty_space height=”500px”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1496957827726{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Go Big or Go Small” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:36px|text_align:left|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeIn” el_class=”heading-title-simple”][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn” el_class=”lead”]Our solutions are designed to scale. We process payments for some of the largest retailers online. Our eCommerce clients love our flexible platform. JetPay offers custom solutions that can happen in a matter of weeks, not months.

Businesses can count on JetPay to deliver reliable online payment processing that includes reports and analytic tools that double as a business and marketing research tool.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” content_placement=”top” parallax=”content-moving” parallax_image=”3352″ css=”.vc_custom_1496175085704{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}” font_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Our #1 mission is to
keep your
customers card data
secure” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:36px|text_align:right|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeIn” el_class=”heading-title-simple”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1496957883610{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text animation=”fadeIn”]

As a PCI Level 1 Service Provider, our real-time security tool analyzes trends in payment activity while identifying any transactions that might be suspected as fraud with 99% accuracy. You’re alerted in real-time so you have time to decline payments.

Coupled with JetPay’s tokenization method, your customer’s sensitive data is replaced with secure tokens to keep card information safe. This removes the burden of storing and keeping sensitive data on your systems – reducing your PCI liability.

[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” parallax=”content-moving” parallax_image=”3296″ el_class=”page-title-extended page-title-parallax”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1498949045030{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_custom_heading text=”PAYMENTS” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:800%20bold%20regular%3A800%3Anormal” el_class=”text-shadow-dark”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1497386948780{padding-top: 45px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text el_class=”heading heading-center m-b-40″]

Get the Most from Just One Provider

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]JetPay’s dedicated payments platform provides you the most services from a single provider. Combining seamless integration of the features you need, we offer more flexibility and options than our competition. Most importantly, we make it easy for your customers to make a payment or purchase a product, anytime, anywhere.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” equal_height=”yes” font_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInLeft” width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1498274853271{padding-top: 5vw !important;padding-right: 5vw !important;padding-bottom: 5vw !important;padding-left: 5vw !important;background-color: #ff6600 !important;}”][vc_column_text]

In Person

Card Present Payments

We provide payment-accepting equipment and processing services to suit your needs. Whether you’re opening up a new shop or need a solution integrated with your existing setup, we’ve got you covered.

 

learn more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1498274862026{padding-top: 5vw !important;padding-right: 5vw !important;padding-bottom: 5vw !important;padding-left: 5vw !important;background-color: #ff812e !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Online

eCommerce & CNP

This is the core of the JetPay payments platform. Our platform is fast and flexible enough to allow you to use a gateway, or not. This is the power of payments + technology.

 

learn more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1498274870066{padding-top: 5vw !important;padding-right: 5vw !important;padding-bottom: 5vw !important;padding-left: 5vw !important;background-color: #ff934b !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Mobile

Payments Anywhere Anytime

Get the tools you need to process payments from anywhere fast. With flat rate pricing for all transactions, this is the smartest solution when paying on the go.

 

learn more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInRight” width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1498274876872{padding-top: 5vw !important;padding-right: 5vw !important;padding-bottom: 5vw !important;padding-left: 5vw !important;background-color: #ffa76d !important;}”][vc_column_text]

OMNI Channel

So Easy, It’s Like Magic

Increase consumer engagement and give your customers an easier way to pay. With an Online bill pay portal, you’re open 24/7. Paperless billing is Eco-friendly too.

 

learn more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1497387061909{padding-top: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://www.jetpay.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/ecommerce-info.png?id=3297) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_empty_space height=”500px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1496122523035{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Traditional Payment Processing” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:36px|text_align:left|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”heading-title-simple”][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]Our PCI DSS-certified payment platform ensures the safe and efficient payment processing of all major credit and debit cards. From e-Commerce to swipe through authorization, this solution provides the latest security enhancements. JetPay’s tokenization process reduces the risk of fraud and identity theft while maintaining our role as one of the few end-to-end payments processors.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1496122602782{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Omni Channel Processing” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:36px|text_align:right|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal” el_class=”heading-title-simple”][vc_column_text el_class=”lead”]

With technology that is fast, agile and built to scale for your business, our Restful API’s provide maximum opportunities in the area of Omni Channel Payments. With a full payment suite, using every electronic payment method available, we provide you the solution you need to deliver a consistent user experience.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1497387104254{padding-top: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://www.jetpay.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/integration-info.png?id=3298) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”500px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”bottom” parallax=”content-moving” parallax_image=”3286″][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1496146763025{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1510811149968{padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.8) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Partner Program

JetPay’s Partner Program is designed with your feedback, communication and the continuous participation of our JetPay team members.

When it comes to satisfying you, the client, JetPay’s impeccable reputation cannot be obtained by the competition.

Learn More[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
